body_html: The use of Power seems really interesting. AFAIK, Power employs NVLink between CPU and GPU so the swapping is significantly faster than PCIe. Could you shed some light on its performance characteristics as most TF users are not familiar with the Power platform? We will be interested to take over this project if we are convinced that it could be more valuable to TF users combined with the alternative hardware platform.
